'''''Seelie in the Snow''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Visitors on the Icy Mountain]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to follow 20 [[Warming Seelie]] in [[Dragonspine]] to their Seelie Courts.
